analysis: The job responsibilities include building and innovating components of the perception stack, collaborating on multimodal models, and applying frontier research in perception. The skills required include experience with large-scale multimodal models and advancing deep learning innovations. The mention of "multimodal models" suggests the integration of multiple types of data, which is a common aspect of Generative AI and language models. Additionally, the focus on deep learning and large-scale models aligns with the development and application of LLMs. Therefore, the job likely involves working with Generative AI or language models.
